mapper.sql: ID, SERVICE_CODE, DISTRIBUTOR_CODE, FATHER_CODE, STATE, CREATE_DATE, IS_DISPLAY_PROVINCE
mapper.select: select a.*, c.NICK_NAME from t_flow_service a INNER JOIN t_flow_distributor b ON a.DISTRIBUTOR_CODE = b.DISTRBUTOR_CODE INNER JOIN t_sys_user c ON c.USER_CODE = b.USER_CODE limit #{start} , #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_flow_service where FATHER_CODE = '0'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_flow_service where FATHER_CODE = #{fatherCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.*, c.NICK_NAME from t_flow_service a INNER JOIN t_flow_distributor b ON a.DISTRIBUTOR_CODE = b.DISTRBUTOR_CODE INNER JOIN t_sys_user c ON c.USER_CODE = b.USER_CODE where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.*, c.NICK_NAME from t_flow_service a INNER JOIN t_flow_distributor b ON a.DISTRIBUTOR_CODE = b.DISTRBUTOR_CODE INNER JOIN t_sys_user c ON c.USER_CODE = b.USER_CODE where SERVICE_CODE = #{quotationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_flow_service (ID, SERVICE_CODE, DISTRIBUTOR_CODE, FATHER_CODE, STATE, CREATE_DATE, IS_DISPLAY_PROVINCE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{distributorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fatherCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDisplayProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into t_flow_service
ID,
SERVICE_CODE,
DISTRIBUTOR_CODE,
FATHER_CODE,
STATE,
CREATE_DATE,
IS_DISPLAY_PROVINCE,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{serviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{distributorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fatherCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isDisplayProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update t_flow_service
SERVICE_CODE = #{serviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISTRIBUTOR_CODE = #{distributorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FATHER_CODE = #{fatherCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_DISPLAY_PROVINCE = #{isDisplayProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_flow_service set SERVICE_CODE = #{serviceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRIBUTOR_CODE = #{distributorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FATHER_CODE = #{fatherCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IS_DISPLAY_PROVINCE = #{isDisplayProvince,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
